field.name: website_description
field.p: Brandon works in IT sector since 10 years. He is known notably for selling mouse traps. With that trick he cut IT budget by almost half within the last 2 years.

field.name: website_description
field.p: Nicole works in IT sector since 20 years. She develops software to help develop websites. She sold her first company at 30 years old and manage to grow Azure Interior from 1 to 55 employees mostly by reselling services on Odoo.
Nicole is author of several books, including Amazon best seller "How Azure and Odoo will change the business world!".
